title: Senate Day 31 of the 2025 Session
summary:
Overview:
The Georgia Senate session on Day 31 of the 2025 Session focused on introducing various bills and resolutions, as well as receiving committee reports on numerous pieces of legislation.

Key Actions:
**HB 167**: Unclear from the transcript
**HB 647**: Unclear from the transcript

Bills Introduced (First Reading):
- SB 330: Bill to borrow the home setting state logo government
- SB 3301: Bill to borrow the home setting state logo government
- SB 3302: Bill to amend an act regarding state logo government
- SR 378: Resolution recognizing Mr. Judge Transformation
- SR 381: Resolution regarding human services
- SR 386: Resolution creating the Senate Safe
- SR 388: Resolution congratulating, commending, and extending
- SR 39D: Resolution recognizing and commending

Notable Moments:
- Introduction of legislative pages from across Georgia
- Confirmation of the journal

Votes:
No specific votes were mentioned in the transcript.

Attendance:
The transcript does not mention quorum or attendance.

Adjournment:
The transcript does not mention when the session adjourned or the date of the next session.
